branchCategory.name: SS0750 Manifold for Series EX600 Integrated (I/O) Serial Transmission System (Fieldbus)
branchCategory.description: <p>SS0750 Plug-in manifold with EX600 serial transmission system.  EX600 system allows modular construction with up to 9 digital and analog input/output units.  Available protocol include EtherNet/IP<span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™, EtherCAT</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®, PROFINET</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®, DeviceNet</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">™, PROFIBUS-DP</span><span style="font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 10pt;">®,  and CC-Link.</span></p>

breadCrumb.name: Manifold for EX600 I/O Fieldbus Serial Transmission System
